amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for 1890 Land Grant Institutions by $6.8 million and decreases Agricultural Research Service funding accordingly.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 57 printed in the Congressional Record to increase by $7 million the bill's funding for the 1890 land grant educational institutions. The amendment offsets by reducing funding for the Agricultural Research Service by and equal amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Clayton amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
